course_description: Offered in rotation. Credit, four hours. A course designed to provide a firm grounding in the rudiments of sculptural practice. Students are exposed to an overview of processes, tools, and materials used in sculpture.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3953, Section #: 1, Type: ART, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-4:30p, Instructor: C. Teruel, Status: Closed
